byline.contributor: Edward Wong contributed reporting from Beijing.

snippet: China and Vietnam agreed to follow a series of steps to reduce tensions in the South China Sea, a source of frequent friction over their rival claims to islands and undersea minerals.
lead_paragraph: China and Vietnam agreed to follow a series of steps to reduce tensions in the South China Sea, a source of frequent friction over their rival claims to islands and undersea minerals.

headline.main: China and Vietnam Move to Reduce Tensions in South China Sea
headline.print_headline: Vietnam Strikes Deal With China On Sea Disputes
headline.seo: China and Vietnam Move to Reduce Tensions in South China Sea
